item.title: ALL TRUCKS AT THE DEALER 25 09 2025 v1.0 1.50 1.56 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 26, 2025

ALL TRUCKS AT THE DEALER 25 09 2025 v1.0 1.50 1.56 ETS2

THIS MOD PUTS ALL OLD TRUCKS AT THE DEALERSHIP TO BUY.

Credits: RODONITCHO MODS

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Vintage Traffic Pack v1.3 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 26, 2025

Vintage Traffic Pack v1.3 ATS

This mod pack enhances the visual variety of in-game traffic by adding classic and vintage paint jobs to trucks and trailers.
The mod replicates only the paint jobs from the trailers adapted for SCS Trailers/Tankers/Grainhoppers
Trucks in Traffic – Kenworth W900 6×4

Trailers in Traffic
SCS Dry Van/Insulated/Reefer 28”
SCS Dry Van/Insulated/Reefer 45”
SCS Dry Van/Insulated/Reefer 53”
SCS Dropdeck 48”
SCS Dropdeck 53”
SCS Fuel Tanker 53”
SCS Double Dry Van/Insulated/Reefer 28”/28”
SCS Triple Dry Van/Insulated/Reefer 28”/28”/28”
SCS Rocky Mountain Double Dry Van/Insulated 45”/28”

Mod Icon Changed
Mod Manager Name Changed

Credits: GMC Community

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
